titleStmt.title: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' gnas rnam par bshad pa
titleStmt.author: rngog blo ldan shes rab

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Size according to the Theg chen gling catalogue ([HMSTSJ7Q]: 269, no. 711: ka 422). The mention “1(132)” is visible on the left of the cover page. A number of interlinear and marginal notes (corrections and glosses), often faded and/or illegible on the image. In the bottom left corner of the last folio (132b), illegible note written in the sense of the margin (** lnga? ***) (maybe indicating the number of missing folios?) Numbering in letters on the recto of the folios; after 100, 100 is represented by +. No number on f. 1 Folio numbers 85 and 86 occur on a single page. Folio number 107 occurs twice, being divided in an "upper" (gong ma) and "lower" ('og ma) page. Lines per folio: 8; 7 on f. 103a; 5 on f. 107bis-a; 3 on f. 107bis-b Orthography: Bindu for m (e.g., rnaMs) - Palatalization of m (e.g., myed) (but absent at the end of the manuscript; the change appears to take place at f. 106a) - Alternative prefix: r- for d- (e.g., rka for dka), sometimes ’a- for m- (e.g., ’thun for mthun) - Particle pa/ba takes the form pa after final –l and occasionally after final –ng, and the form ba occasionally after final –n (e.g., yin ba) - Particle tu/du takes the form tu after final –n (e.g., don tu) and du after final –b and final -g - Final particle po after final –b (e.g., grub po) - Additional prefix b- (e.g., bskyed par, bsnyon pa) - Superabundant ’a rjes ’jug (e.g., brtse’, dpe’) - Variant orthography (bstan chos for bstan chos; the tsom for the tshom; kun las bstus pa for kun las btus pa; bdag chag for bdag cag; la stsogs for la sogs) - Occasional reverse i (e.g. 3b5) - On the last folio (132b), numerous end letters written as subscript; bindu over the tsheg for m in a negation (ma, mi); abbreviations (e.g. for rjes su, phyir ro) The lemmas from PVin as well as citations of verses and indication of the end of a subsection, seem to have been written in colored ink, maybe by a different hand (but this is not the case at the end of the text). The folio 107bis seems to be from a different hand and was probably inserted later. There might have been a change of scribe at fol. 106 (palatalization of m is absent from this point onward) There are significant changes on the last folio (132b) and the last two lines of that folio are written in smaller script, maybe by a different hand.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: lo chen gyi mdzad pa'i rnaM nges kyi Ti ka bzhugs so ||

slob dpon shes rab 'byung nas sbas pa dang | zhi ba bzang po la rtsogs pa na re | sngon po la rtsogs pa'i rnam pa ni | shasshes pa las gzhan ma yin te | rang rig pa'i shes pas rig par bya ba'i phyir ro ||
de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong pas nges so || khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni | rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste | des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no || 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na
de rang gi rang bzhin yin no || byed pa gzhan gyis rig na rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o || des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyab po nges so zhe na ||
tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' ba'i gnas rnam par bshad pa ||| lo tsa ba shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis sbyar ba'o || ||
shag kya'i dge slong 'dar rin chen 'bar gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so ||| ||||||
